title: CBI conference: PM accused of 'shambolic' speech to business leaders
content:
1. CBI conference: PM accused of 'shambolic' speech to business leaders  BBC News
  2. ‘Embarrassing’: Boris Johnson criticised for rambling speech to CBI  The Guardian
  3. We all must go to Peppa Pig World, says UK PM Johnson in speech flap  Reuters UK
  4. Peppa Pig and prolonged pauses – it is, I think, time to start worrying about the prime minister  The Independent
  5. UK's Johnson tries to woo businesses, praises Peppa Pig  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
